backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining product, inventory, sales, rules, cash transactions, and user profile storage with CRUD-like methods and access control mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration stub providing a no-op state migration from old to new actor structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application shell managing view state, query client, navbar, routed page rendering, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/AdjustStockModal: Modal form for adding or reducing inventory stock with validation, error normalization, and backend mutation integration.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the dashboard with daily sales summary, payment method totals, and automatic low‑stock detection. Handles loading, error states, and inventory-based alerts.
frontend/src/components/EditInventoryIte: Provides a modal for editing an inventory item with validation, duplicate-name checks, and update mutation handling. Pre-fills fields and normalizes error messages.
frontend/src/components/EditSaleModal.ts: Modal for editing a sale’s items and payment method, including quantity/price validation and update submission. Displays calculated totals and supports item removal.
frontend/src/components/InventoryFormMod: Form modal for adding new inventory items with validation, duplicate-name checks, and auto-calculated final stock. Submits data via an add-inventory mutation.
frontend/src/components/InventoryPage.ts: Main inventory management page showing the inventory table, add/edit/adjust stock modals, and low-stock highlighting. Handles loading, errors, and data refresh.
frontend/src/components/InventoryReportP: Displays inventory adjustment history with filters, loading/error states, and a table of report entries.
frontend/src/components/LowStockWarningD: Shows a dialog listing items at or below minimum stock with a scrollable table layout.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with main menu items, dropdowns, and view switching logic.
frontend/src/components/ProductFormModal: Modal form for adding new products, handling image upload, validation, and submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays product catalog with loading/error states and allows opening the add-product modal.
frontend/src/components/QuantityPromptMo: Prompts the user for a quantity when adding a product, calculating subtotal and confirming selection.
Reusable error display component showing normalized messages and a retry button.
Renders the sales report UI with date filtering, export to Excel, editing and deleting sales, and totals computation.
frontend/src/components/SignInRequiredSt: Displays a prompt for users to sign in via Internet Identity with a login button and loading state.
frontend/src/components/StockDeductionRu: Empty file placeholder for stock deduction rules modal.
Provides a transaction interface for selecting products, managing a cart, and recording sales with payment methods.
frontend/src/constants/productOptions.ts: Defines constant lists and types for product categories, sizes, and names used across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches caller role from the backend with a safe fallback and warns not to use it for UI gating.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardSummary.t: Fetches dashboard summary data from the backend using the public actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvalidateActorQue: Provides a helper to invalidate all actor-related react-query queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: Provides queries and mutations for listing, adding, updating, and adjusting inventory items via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventoryReport.ts: Fetches inventory reports via react-query using the public actor with optional filters and date range.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides product list fetching and a mutation to add products, invalidating the products cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicActor.ts: Creates and manages an anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordSale.ts: Provides a mutation to record sales and invalidates dashboard and inventory queries after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesMutations.ts: Contains mutations to update or delete sales, invalidating sales and dashboard data afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesReport.ts: Fetches sales records for a given time range using the public actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Converts backend errors into normalized user-friendly messages with categorized titles.
frontend/src/utils/exportToXls.ts: Generates an HTML-based XLS file from sales line items and triggers a download.
frontend/src/utils/inventoryName.ts: Provides utilities for normalizing inventory names and detecting duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/salesFormat.ts: Formats currency, dates, and payment method labels for sales data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, container settings, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's shared-data architecture, current features, and pending requests focused on removing login requirements and ensuring a global dataset accessible to all users.
